attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr.Brown and members of the cabbinet,
I hope you will read this letter whateverer the outcome will be i trust your judgment that will be in the public interest.
I am a romanian living in the uk for 5 years.I know you have already received a petition from the romanians here to have the working restrictions lifted.
I urge you to do so and even if true,not because of the reason of classifing us as second class eu citizens,but for the british people's benefit.How?
well,there are many romanians still illegal here.they do not pay tax,n.i.and maybe some of these commit crimes because they cannot get work.Please ,my request is lift the restrictions,and support the working obiding foreigner and get tougher laws to remove the ones that commit crimes.ship them back home ,i hate them myself.
thank you

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
